# Khd1_evolution_structure_2021

Evolutionary analysis of Khd1 homologs including Pbp2 homologs and structural analysis of Khd1 homologs

This repository includes all the supplementary data and analysis

## evolution_analysis

Data used for evolutionary analysis and resulting figures

Some analysis are described in files in subdirectories of evolution_analysis

## structure_analysis

Files of predicted Khd1 structures
